summary: An ex-GI wants to open a mink farm in Wisconsin; but is mistaken for a look-alike, a gambler who owes a lot of money.
cast: Fred MacMurray|Marguerite Chapman|Akim Tamiroff|William Demarest|Rita Johnson|Harry Davenport|Douglass Dumbrille|Karolyn Grimes|Dewey Robinson|Hugh Prosser|Tom Moffatt|Herbert Evans|Frank Moran|Charles Arnt|George Chandler|Jimmie Dundee|Edward Gargan|J. Farrell MacDonald|Bert Moorhouse
title: Pardon My Past
